benchmark_details.name: RTime (Reversed in Time)
benchmark_details.overview: RTime is a novel temporal-emphasized video-text retrieval dataset designed to comprehensively assess video understanding capabilities, especially in temporal understanding, with a focus on incorporating harder-negative samples.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To address the lack of temporal understanding evaluation in existing video-text retrieval benchmarks.

data.source: Videos collected from the internet based on a curated list of activities with strong temporality.
data.annotation: Videos are manually annotated by professional annotators and supplemented with GPT-4 generated captions.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the correctly retrieved samples in the top K retrieval results.
methodology.interpretation: High recall or accuracy means better model performance in retrieving video-text pairs.
methodology.validation: Models are validated against typically retrieved video-text samples and the performance is compared between benchmarks.
